scripts.build.angular: pnpm i && rimraf tempAngular && ng-packagr -p src/angular/package.json -c tsconfig.angular.json && cpy 'tempAngular/**/*' 'plugin/angular' --parents
scripts.clean: rimraf ./plugin/**/*.d.ts ./plugin/**/*.js ./plugin/**/*.js.map plugin/node_modules plugin/package-lock.json plugin/README.md demo/node_modules demo-angular/node_modules
scripts.build: cp README.md ./plugin && rm -f .tsbuildinfo && npm run tsc && npm run ngc
scripts.demo.android: npm run build && cd demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android.watch: npm run build && npm run plugin.tscwatch && cd demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm run build && cd demo-angular && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.android.watch: npm run build && npm run plugin.tscwatch && cd demo-angular && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd demo-angular && tns plugin remove nativescript-image && tns plugin add ../plugin && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-image && tns plugin add ../plugin
